svcsubproc.title: Powered Passenger Door Opener
svcsubproc.para: The passenger entry door opener is available with an electric door opener as standard. The door opener mechanism is located above the door opening in an enclosed compartment ( Fig. 94 Item 1). The door mechanism is equipped with an emergency override that is located on the door panel ( Fig. 94, Item 3) at the controller. The door opener control switch is located on the driver left wing switch panel.

figure.caption: Figure 94. Passenger Entry Door Opener Mechanism Compartment

calloutgroup.callout1: PASSENGER DOOR OPENER MECHANISM COMPARTMENT DOOR
CURB SIDE BUS INTERIOR LIGHT BAR
ELECTRIC DOOR EMERGENCY OVERRIDE RELEASE HANDLE

svcsubproc.para: An optional air controlled passenger door opener is also available. The activation switch for the air operated door is located on the driver left wing switch panel. The door cylinder and valves are located in the compartment above the entry door. The emergency override switch is located on the outboard surface of the driver right wing switch panel ( Fig. 95, Item 3).

figure.caption: Figure 95. Air Operated Door Emergency Override Switch
